dct_title_s: Preliminary Chart of New York Bay and the Harbor
dct_description_sm: Newark Bay, New York Bay, Hudson River, Jamaica Bay, and Raritan Bay are waterways shown. Map also shows Staten Island, Perth Amboy, South Amboy, Bergen Neck, Bedloes, Ellis, Governors, and Caven Point, Coney Island, Rockaway Beach. Soundings are shown in the waters. Instructions for ships, a table of tides, a listing of light houses and beacons, and variations of the magnetic needle are given in tables.
